timeline.bodyText: It may be more efficient to replace this with !getPostDecorrelateRules().isEmpty()
timeline.author: liyafan82

replies.bodyText: Which kind of list has a more efficient impl ?
replies.author: danny0405

replies.bodyText: For example, ArrayList has O(1) time complexity for size() operation. However, the time complexity for org.apache.calcite.runtime.ConsList is O(n).
replies.author: liyafan82

timeline.author: liyafan82
timeline.diffHunk:

     /** Sets {@link #decorrelator}. */
     Config withDecorrelator(RelDecorrelator decorrelator);
   }
+

timeline.message:
[CALCITE-4225] Make RelDecorrelator pluggable

* Change all the members of RelDecorrelator protected scope
* Add RelDecorrelator.getVisitor to override the dispatcher visitor
* Add RelDecorrelator.getPostDecorrelateRules for post decorrelation
  optimisation

timeline.bodyText: Do we want to consider annotating it with "@NotNull"?
timeline.author: liyafan82

replies.bodyText: No, because @NotNull should be the default.
replies.author: danny0405
